title.rendered: How to get Windows 10 Minecraft Edition for free

content.rendered:
Do you remember how Minecraft was back when it was released? It had the simplest controls and gameplay where you just mine or place the blocks with no destination. However, the game was already popular around the world. Over the years it has improved and become the Minecraft we know today. Now you can play the game on different devices with 3D visualizations and advanced gameplays where you can complete missions to earn minecoins. This game has a huge following and anyone who knows anything about gaming must have heard of this game. So if you are one of them and want to get Windows 10 Minecraft edition for free, welcome! This article tells you in detail how to download and install two different versions of Windows 10 Minecraft for free. Read on to find out!

How to get Windows 10 Minecraft Edition for free

Developed by Mojang Studios, this sandbox video game can be customized using various application program interfaces (API) that can generate different types of game modifications and maps. It attracts every gaming fan’s attention and delivers them exciting modes and gameplays. Also, different modes allow players to compete with different mobs in the game and play with other players as well.

That game modes available on Minecraft are:

  • Survive: In this mode, players must Collect various natural resources such as stones and woods available in game to craft specific blocks and other items. To survive you have to fight and defend yourself against uncertain elements like drowning, hunger, mobs etc.
  • hardcore: It’s the hardest setting mode of survival mode. It has the permadeath which means if you die in the hardcore world you are no longer allowed to interact with that world. You can either explore the world by staying in spectator mode or clear it entirely. However, this mode can only be accessed in the Java Edition.
  • adventure: You can experience user-created custom adventures and maps. The gameplay is similar to Survival mode but with additional limitations to play. Also the Command block In this mode, users can extend interactions with players using scripted server commands.
  • Creative: This mode allows Access to all articles and resources via the in-game inventory menu, with the ability to remove or place them as needed. You can also play freely in the game world by first switching the ability and your character will not be affected by starvation or other damage in the game.
  • Viewers: This mode blocks your character from interacting with gameplay. You can just fly through and watch the gameplay where other characters interact. However, this mode allows the character locked in spectator mode shift the perspective with another of the active players interacting in gameplay. This mode is only available in Console Legacy and Java editions.

After reading so far, you might have guessed that this game has more than one edition. We will discuss how to get Windows 10 Minecraft Edition for free for two different editions:

  • Java edition
  • Bedrock edition

You can download any of the above editions and install them on your system to enjoy this popular game with free trials. Read and follow the steps below to do the same.

Method 1: Through the Microsoft Store

You can download Windows 10 Minecraft Edition for free on your system from Microsoft Store. To do this, follow the steps below.

1. Press the Windows key on your keyboard and type Microsoft store in the search bar. Click on Open.

2. Enter Microsoft for Windows in the search bar and press Enter. press the Free trial period option as shown below.

3. Wait for the download to complete.

4. After the download process is complete, click the Game Option as shown below.

5. The The Minecraft game is loading on the screen. Wait a few seconds to finish loading.

6. Now the game is installed on your system. Click on that Game Opportunity to play this wonderful game.

Method 2: Via the Minecraft website

The Java edition offers an amazing building experience with cross-platform play between Windows, Mac and Linux. You can try the Java Edition Free Trial by reading and following the steps below:

1. Visit the Minecraft Official Website to download the Java Edition with a free trial.

2. Scroll down and click Download now option below MINECRAFT: JAVA EDITION FOR WINDOWSAs shown below.

3. Click to open the downloaded file MinecraftInstaller.exe File.

4. Check the I have read and accept the Microsoft Software License Terms option and click the To install Option as shown below.

5. The download process will start.

6. If you are having trouble communicating with the Microsoft Store, click Click here to open the Microsoft Store Possibility.

7. Microsoft store will open on your system with the Minecraft launcher application loaded in it. press the Will option as shown below.

8. Enter yours Date of birth and click Next.

9. The Microsoft launcher will start downloading.

10. After the download is complete, log in to your Microsoft or mojang account.

11. Select or enter the desired username Choose your online name as shown below and click CREATE AN ACCOUNT.

12. Now you can play MINECRAFT: Java Edition demo version or MINECRAFT for Windows free trial.
